title: Champion idea / concept
body:
Hi everyone, been thinking of a new champion for league for along time trying to perfect the ideas/ abilities etc but I think thats up to riot so here goes the general border lines for my champ that I have created in my head (c) Nathan

Gruff, the troll Slayer
Gruff Is a melee brusing top laner who can deliver crushing blows and hard hits at the expense of his attack range.
He is mainly a top lamer as he thrives in 1 v 1 situations while in teamfights he lacks abit of endurance but on with the show ( as riot would say) 

Passive : Heavy feet
Gruffs passive heavy feet causes his movement speed to decrease to 300 (300/325/350) after 3 continuous auto attacks on the same target or hit by 3 auto attacks from an enemy within 7 seconds, also while slowed he deals 20% of his bonus attack damage for the next 3 autos. Has a 40 (40/30/25) second cool down 

Q. Horn thrust
Mana cost: 70/65/55/50/40
Active: Gruff throws enemy champions up in the air for 0.75 seconds dealing 40 physical damage (40/55/60/70/80) + ( 1/3/5/7/10% of base health)
If struck with horn thrust while gruff is slowed from passive enemy is stunned for 1 second
Cooldown :18/16/12/10/6 seconds

W: Stampede 
Mana cost: 60/55/40/35/30
Passive: Each time Gruff has his passive activated he gains 2 armour and magic resist ( can be stacked up to 8 times in 5 minutes 
Active: Gruff consumes his stacks and is given a aura of nature that shields him from 50/75/100/125/150 + ( 0.5 x base armour ) damage 
Cooldown: 22/17/13/10/8

E: Stomp
Mana cost : 50 at all ranks
Active: Gruff stomps a enemy with his hoofs and slows them by 15%/20%/30%/35%/40% and deals 15/30/45/60/80 magic damage +(1x bonus ability power)
Cooldown : 10/9/8/7/6 seconds

R: Mad Goat Rush
Mana cost : 100/80/65
Active: Gruff gets consumed in a rage and sends himself a targeted area able to travel through terrain dealing 100/150/250  (+ 10% of bonus attack damage) AoE magic damage 

Cooldown: 105/90/70 seconds 
Range 1000/2000/3500

Just a very brief description which I really think riot should look at !! And give me a little credit üòé 
Lord wise I think he should be loosely based on bill goat gruff of course as well as the goat Pokemon 
Cheers for reading üòé also is 2nd cousins with Alistar

replies.body:
Hey man,

Really cool concept!

I love the work you have put into it, fleshing out the abilities and numbers a little. 

Looks like he is tanky and has some CC. aside from some numbers adjustments, I think he could be a viable champ (I actually think is passive is way to punishing, especially in lane)

However one thing I would really like you to consider is, what makes this champion special? What kind of themes and background does Gruff have and how is that represented through his gameplay?

How do you want the player to feel when they play Gruff?

and finally just a personal thing, I think ultimates should be extremely unique and personal to a champion. I assume at max level it has 3500 range (not 35000). The ultimate for Gruff is purely a long range AOE charge (similar to malphites but without the knock up and with range instead). Is there a unique mechanic that Gruff should be using (maybe even tied into his passive,like you have done with his q).

But overall definitely a cool concept.

I think there is definitely room for Gruff in this meta, now which isnt truly suited for pure tanks, but stealthy fighters with good cc. Talk to the people up top @Marauduar, its going to be good! Plus, {{champion:6}} needs someone to match his power xx
Yes indeed I meant 3500 ! üëç oh cheers for the advice will defiantly take it on board and review his themes, unique characteristics and overall feeling.

I think it's cool that you're trying ideas for champions, but some details are missing. And he will suffer from some balance issues.

Take this scenario for example, teemo auto attacks you 3 times. You recieve a slow bringing you to really low movement speed meaning you're almost a sitting duck for taking punishment.

Is the Q a skill shot or targetted? Is the E a skillshot or targetted? How long will the E last? 
The passive on the W is underpowered. Take a look at riven's E, a dash and a shield, on a short cooldown with AD scaling. 60 mana for a 50 damage shield? That mana cost is way too high for a mediocre shield on such a long cooldown.

You've given him bonus AD, base hp, base Armor and AP scaling. What kind of items would make him effective/viable?

I know it's your idea, but would you consider a form of levelution mechanic, where your ultimate destroys terrain for a duration. Creating a rip in the terrain for both allies and enemies to pass through.
Cheers for the advice will go back to the drawing board
